name: Day Job (Dapper Rabbit Games)
description:
Your goal is to find and destroy the observer. To do this, you must act as one of them. Pretend to work, do as the observer says, and climb your way up to the 3rd floor. 

Day Job is a student project that included a team of one programmer and 3 artists. It is a work of love and Dapper Rabbits first game.
